scripts.start: pnpm run prepare:component && pnpm run prepare:tauri-assets && pnpm run build:node && tauri dev
scripts.build:tauri:all: pnpm run prepare:component && pnpm run prepare:tauri-assets && pnpm run build:node && tauri build
scripts.build:tauri: pnpm run prepare:component && pnpm run prepare:tauri-assets && pnpm run build:node && tauri build --bundles deb,rpm
scripts.typecheck: pnpm run prepare:component && pnpm run check:generated:convex && tsc --noEmit
scripts.typecheck:convex: pnpm run prepare:component && pnpm run dev:convex:once && pnpm run check:generated:convex && pnpm run check:wiring:convex && tsc --noEmit
scripts.tauri:check: pnpm run prepare:tauri-assets && (cd src-tauri && cargo check)
